================ SCRAPED PROFILE DATA ================
NAME:     Niels Andriesse
HEADLINE: Co-Founder & Co-CTO @ Supermoon AI
LOCATION: 1st
PHOTO URL: https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4E03AQGeqElumAwBIw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_200_200/profile-displayphoto-shrink_200_200/0/1701612551531?e=1767225600&v=beta&t=wfJ8QzwA5JWrw2QWDYbWR_zr9eULGDK_wRJZxL1-uo4

[ABOUT]
Co-founder and co-CTO of Supermoon AI: an AI solutions product company. Co-founder of Superluminal: together with my co-founder I built and shipped a complete AI code interpreter before OpenAI. Pioneer W22/23. Acquired by Supermoon AI. Author of Neuron: an open-source experiment in using an evolutionary algorithm for the optimization of a neural network's hyperparameters. Co-author of Swift Numenta: an open-source, Swift version of Numenta's "thousand brains" approach to AI. Author of TechGPT: an open-source experiment in using LLMs to find new discoveries in the intersections between different fields of study. Lead engineer at Session: a fully decentralized, E2EE, onion-routed messenger. Scaled from 0 to 250,000+ active users. Today Session has 1M+ active users. Senior iOS engineer and later lead Android engineer at Tellus: a comprehensive real estate FinTech platform for all parties involved in real estate (backed by a16z). Freelance software engineer at Toptal: a freelancing network that accepts only the top 3% of freelance talent. I worked on various projects such as DynamiCare Health. Co-founder of Archimedes: the graphing calculator re-invented for the 21st century. Scaled from ~10k users to ~250k users. Archimedes is still used in classrooms around the world today. Aerospace engineering at TU Delft (2011 - 2014). Worked on several interesting projects such as software for automatic transfer orbit optimization, a complete design of the internal structure of an aerobatic racing aircraft, and software for the automatic preliminary design of an arbitrary wing. â€¦see more

Part of the Pioneer W22/23 batch. Acquired by Supermoon AI.
  3. Lead iOS Engineer | Lead Android Engineer | Product Lead | Session | Apr 2019 - Jul 2021 Â· 2 yrs 4 mos | Melbourne, Australia | A fully decentralized, privately routed, and end-to-end encrypted private messenger. I was the main contributor on both iOS and Android and developed most of both applications, in addition to developing part of the back-end. I was also responsible for ensuring the security and privacy of the application (audited by QuarksLab) and managing the team. When I joined, Session hadn't yet launched on mobile. By the time I left it had 250,000+ active users and a rating of 4.1/5 on Google Play and 4.4/5 on the App Store. Today Session has 1M+ active users and is one of the most used decentralized applications. | Session â€“ Send Messages, Not Metadata. | Session is a private messenger that aims to remove any chance of metadata collection by routing all messages through an onion routing network.
  4. Tellus | 1 yr 11 mos | San Francisco Bay Area | Lead Android Engineer | May 2018 - Jan 2019 Â· 9 mos | Tellus | Real Estate Platform | Invest | Home Loans | Collect Rent Online | Free Tenant Screening | Tellus is a comprehensive real estate management platform for investors, homeowners, landlords, renters, property managers, agents, and service professionals.
